class.rdfs:comment: A unique instance of a BroadcastService on a CableOrSatelliteService lineup.
class.rdfs:label: BroadcastChannel

schema:broadcastChannelId.rdfs:comment: The unique address by which the BroadcastService can be identified in a provider lineup. In US, this is typically a number.
schema:broadcastChannelId.rdfs:label: broadcastChannelId

schema:broadcastFrequency.rdfs:comment: The frequency used for over-the-air broadcasts. Numeric values or simple ranges e.g. 87-99. In addition a shortcut idiom is supported for frequences of AM and FM radio channels, e.g. "87 FM".
schema:broadcastFrequency.rdfs:label: broadcastFrequency

schema:broadcastServiceTier.rdfs:comment: The type of service required to have access to the channel (e.g. Standard or Premium).
schema:broadcastServiceTier.rdfs:label: broadcastServiceTier

schema:genre.rdfs:comment: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group.
schema:genre.rdfs:label: genre

schema:providesBroadcastService.rdfs:comment: The BroadcastService offered on this channel.
schema:providesBroadcastService.rdfs:label: providesBroadcastService
